page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In the school yard we play all types of games. The boys play football most of the time but will occasionially play 'bull dog' or 'cat & mouse'. Girls do join in with the boys in cat & mouse which is similar to bull dog. One person has to try to catch or touch people as they run from one end of the yard to the other. The girls also play skipping games with rhymes,and 'two balls' against the wall. Some of the games involve just singing & doing actions. One of the songs we sing is called "My name is Diana Dors". Here are the words. {MY NAME IS DIANA DORS, {AND I'M A MOVIE STAR {I'VE GOT A CUTE, CUTE FACE, {I PLAY A MONKEY GUITAR, {I'VE GOT THE LIPS OOH, {I'VE GOT THE HIPS OOH, {GOT THE TURN AROUND MOVIE STAR}(twice)
